> can someone point me to any dox out there on how to write tests

> code which

> on how to
> write tests for streams.
>

> public class Server
> {
> 	....

> 	{
> 		// this is the functionality i want to be able to test
> 	}
> }
>
> one approach that i am considering is creating a Server object and the two
> streams using ByteArray<Streams>, passing the streams to the
> service(..) method
> .. then passing the streams onto a separate thread from the
> application thread
> which does i/o the way a client typically would with the server
> by calling i/o
> methods on the streams.
>
> any ideas, pointers and hints appreciated! tia ~
